title: Avantasia - Argentina 2013 - DVD MULTICAM
description:
Avantasia
Teatro Flores, Buenos Aires, Argentina
June 25, 2013

DVD with multicam videos by Duranga

Setlist:

Intro/Spectres 
(with Tobias Sammet)
The Watchmakers' Dream 
(with Oliver Hartmann) (Live debut)
The Story Ain't Over 
(with Bob Catley)
The Great Mystery 
(with Bob Catley)
Prelude 
Reach Out for the Light 
(with Michael Kiske)
Breaking Away 
(with Michael Kiske)
Scales of Justice 
(with Thomas Rettke)
What's Left of Me 
(with Eric Martin)
Promised Land 
(with Eric Martin)
The Scarecrow 
(with Oliver Hartmann)
Shelter from the Rain 
(With Michael Kiske and Bob Catley)
In Quest For 
(with Bob Catley)
The Wicked Symphony 
(with Thomas Rettke, Bob Catley, Amanda Somerville and Oliver Hartmann)
Lost in Space 
(with Tobias Sammet)
Savior in the Clockwork 
(with Eric Martin)
Stargazers 
(with Oliver Hartmann, Michael Kiske and Thomas Rettke)
Twisted Mind 
(with Eric Martin)
Dying for an Angel 
(with Eric Martin)
Encore:
Farewell 
(with Amanda Somerville and Michael Kiske)
Avantasia 
(with Michael Kiske)
The Seven Angels 
(with Michael Kiske and Oliver Hartmann)
Sign of the Cross 
(with everybody)
